= Introduction =

An example of how to use the API.


= Details =

{{{
  final static long CALL_FREQ=146520000; 
  RadioControl radio=new RadioHRD("localhost", 7809); //get the radio control for HRD
  if(!radio.isThisRadioControlled()){
     fail("Hrd not connected");
  }
        long currentfreq=radio.getFreq(); // get current frequency
        Mode initialMode=radio.getMode();
        radio.setMode(Mode.FM);
        radio.setFreq(CALL_FREQ); // change to new frequency
        radio.setRepeaterOffset(0);    // set simplex 
        radio.pttPush(); // hit the ptt
 
// talk

        radio.pttRelease(); // release the ptt
        radio.setFreq(currentfreq) // reset the freq.
        radio.setMode(initialMode); // and the mode
